# apples_record (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **name** (String) The name of an apple
- **sort** (String) The sort of an apple

### Optional

- **count_items** (Number) The count of an apple
- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
